metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43376 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in /hoteldruid/clienti.php of Hoteldruid v3.0.5 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload injected into the nometipotariffa1 parameter.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
